trans-unit.source: o3,oc T: Choose one of your creatures and have your opponent choose one of his or her creatures. Both target creatures become tapped. Your creature does its power in damage to your opponent's creature, and your opponent's creature does its power in damage to yours.

trans-unit.resname: PHPR·2 | Sewers of Estark | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: PHPR·2 | Sewers of Estark | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Choose one Target attacking creature is unblockable this turn; or prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target blocking creature and all creatures it's blocking this turn.

trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Attacking does not cause Windseeker Centaur to tap.
Loyal and passionate in battle, the Windseeker tribe roams the Green Lands near the Honeyed Sea.
If assigned as a blocker, Giant Badger gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
The wizard Greensleeves called a Giant Badger to her aid in an battle with the desert mage Karli.

During your upkeep, flip a coin. Opponent calls heads or tails while coin is in the air. If flip ends up in opponent's favor, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you. oc T: Add two colorless mana to your mana pool. Play this ability as an interrupt.
